passage: In 1995, British author Philip Pullman published the first book in his fantasy trilogy, His Dark Materials. The series explores themes such as the nature of consciousness, the consequences of scientific inquiry, and the power dynamics between authority figures and individuals. The story follows two children, Lyra Belacqua and Will Parry, as they navigate parallel universes and encounter various magical creatures. Pullman's work has been praised for its intricate world-building and thought-provoking themes.
